metadata.source: Multiple sources including provided PDF and public information
metadata.purpose: Comprehensive AS/NZS standards for solar, batteries, and electrical installations
metadata.note: These are references to standards, not the full copyrighted content

AS_NZS_3000_2018.title: Electrical installations (Wiring Rules)
AS_NZS_3000_2018.scope: Fundamental standard for electrical installations in Australia and New Zealand
AS_NZS_3000_2018.relevance_to_solar: Primary wiring and electrical safety standard for all solar installations

AS_NZS_3100.title: Approval and test specification - General requirements for electrical equipment
AS_NZS_3100.scope: General safety requirements for electrical equipment
AS_NZS_3100.relevance_to_solar: Applies to solar inverters and electrical components

AS_NZS_5033_2021.title: Installation and safety requirements for photovoltaic (PV) arrays
AS_NZS_5033_2021.scope: Specific requirements for PV system installation
AS_NZS_5033_2021.relevance: THE primary standard for PV installations in Australia/NZ

AS_NZS_4777_1_2016.title: Grid connection of energy systems via inverters - Installation requirements
AS_NZS_4777_1_2016.scope: Requirements for connecting distributed energy resources to the grid
AS_NZS_4777_1_2016.relevance_to_solar: Mandatory for all grid-connected solar systems

AS_NZS_4777_2_2020.title: Grid connection of energy systems via inverters - Inverter requirements

AS_NZS_5139_2019.title: Electrical installations - Safety of battery systems for use with power conversion equipment
AS_NZS_5139_2019.scope: Safety requirements for battery energy storage systems
AS_NZS_5139_2019.relevance: MANDATORY for all battery storage installations

AS_IEC_62619.title: Secondary cells and batteries containing alkaline or other non-acid electrolytes - Safety requirements for secondary lithium cells and batteries
AS_IEC_62619.scope: Specific safety requirements for lithium batteries
AS_IEC_62619.relevance_to_solar: Applies to lithium battery systems in solar storage

AS_NZS_1170.title: Structural design actions
AS_NZS_1170.relevance_to_solar: Structural requirements for rooftop solar mounting

AS_1684.title: Residential timber-framed construction
AS_1684.relevance_to_solar: Roof structural requirements for residential solar

AS_NZS_1768.title: Lightning protection
AS_NZS_1768.relevance_to_solar: Important for solar installations in lightning-prone areas

AS_NZS_3835.title: Installation and safety requirements for photovoltaic (PV) arrays

AS_NZS_4509.title: Stand-alone power systems - Safety requirements and test methods

AS_NZS_4755.title: Demand response capabilities and supporting technologies
AS_NZS_4755.scope: Smart grid and demand response requirements
AS_NZS_4755.relevance_to_solar: Applies to smart solar inverters and battery systems

AS_1284.title: Electricity metering
AS_1284.relevance_to_solar: Applies to net metering in solar installations

compliance_hierarchy.enforcement: Referenced in regulations - legal compliance required
Best practice - may be required for warranties/insurance

major_changes: New requirements for lithium battery installations

cost_and_availability.note: AS/NZS standards are copyrighted and must be purchased from Standards Australia

electromagnetic_compatibility.AS_NZS_CISPR_11: Industrial, scientific and medical equipment - Radio-frequency disturbance characteristics
electromagnetic_compatibility.AS_NZS_CISPR_22: Information technology equipment - Radio disturbance characteristics

fire_safety.AS_1530: Methods for fire tests on building materials, components and structures
fire_safety.AS_1670: Fire detection, warning, control and intercom systems

commonly_referenced_international_standa.IEC_62109: Safety of power converters for use in photovoltaic power systems
commonly_referenced_international_standa.IEC_62446: Grid connected photovoltaic systems - Minimum requirements for system documentation, commissioning tests and inspection
commonly_referenced_international_standa.IEC_61215: Terrestrial photovoltaic (PV) modules - Design qualification and type approval
commonly_referenced_international_standa.IEC_61727: Photovoltaic (PV) systems - Characteristics of the utility interface
commonly_referenced_international_standa.UL_1741: Inverters, Converters, Controllers and Interconnection System Equipment
commonly_referenced_international_standa.IEEE_1547: Standard for Interconnection and Interoperability of Distributed Energy Resources

reddit_commonly_discussed_issues: AS/NZS 3000 DC isolator placement - must be accessible but not in living areas
AS/NZS 5033 roof edge clearances - 1m from roof edges in most cases
AS/NZS 5139 battery ventilation - natural ventilation requirements for lithium batteries
AS/NZS 4777 grid protection - frequency and voltage ride-through settings
PV cable support requirements under AS/NZS 5033
Battery room construction requirements under AS/NZS 5139
Inverter installation clearances and access requirements
Main switch accessibility and emergency isolation
Documentation and certification requirements for grid connection
google_search_frequently_found: AS/NZS 3000 free download - NOT AVAILABLE (copyrighted material)
AS/NZS 5033 summary - available from CEC and training providers
AS/NZS 5139 battery installation guide - summary guides available
AS/NZS 4777 grid connection requirements - DNSP summaries available
Grid connection application processes by DNSP
